Technology is a big contribution in our lives. There are many hardware devices which make our life journey easier, make it more easier when it can be remotely controlled from anywhere.
\n /n Why I decided to build a desktop application which name is “Mit-E Bot Controller”. This is capable to transmit data and received data at a time from device / hardware module via LAN and internet connection. By help of this remote user can able to command device and the monitoring also. This software is so flexible, it can easily connect the module via IP address or database connection.
There has two kind of connection method, users must have to connect one among them. If the module or hardware device is connected to a LAN connection, users need an IP address, or if the module or device is connected to the Internet, users have to provide the information of database server. Users must select one of them for connection. Once connected to the device with the remote, users can easily send signals and also receive signals from the device. One of the great advantage of this software is platform independent. This software can run on any operating system example like Windows, Mac, Unix, Linux kernel.
Some of the key features of this application are that it is able to stream live video, can provide digital and PWM signal and at a time can read three different kind of sensor value from module. The main interface of the “Mit-E Bot Controller” consists of three parts. On the left side is the transmission part, on the right side is the credentials information part of the device and on the right side is the receiver part. The install process of this software is very simple, users do not need to install any third party. Because I\'ve combined all the necessary file into a single setup file. Hopefully, it will give a good experience.
